[[Temari]] jumps and swings her [[Giant Folding Fan]] to create two powerful hurricane-level torrents of [[wind]] that travel towards the opponent, severely damaging them upon making contact.

[[es:Arte Ninja: Huracán]]
[[pl:Sztuka Ninja: Huragan]]
